Opportunities to adopt innovative digital technologies, platforms, and tools can be further explored to propel the regulatory environment further into the future. These opportunities include data-sharing tools such as the use of a cloud-based data system to support a more agile regulatory decision-making process
69 and processes facilitated by artificial intelligence.
